Menteri KKP Edhy Prabowo Siap Tampung Keluhan 24 Jam
06 Nov 2019, 06:33 by Antara, Kodrat Setiawan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Menteri Kelautan dan Perikanan Edhy Prabowo menyatakan pihaknya siap selama 24 jam untuk menampung berbagai keluhan serta mengharapkan berbagai pihak tidak ragu mendatangi KKP bila ada masalah yang perlu dibantu. "Kami siap 24 jam mendengar keluhan," kata Menteri Edhy di Jakarta, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Dia mengatakan telah biasa mendengarkan berbagai masukan sepanjang hari ketika menjadi anggota DPR. Menteri Kelautan dan Perikanan juga menyatakan, berbagai pihak tidak perlu gemetar datang ke kementerian karena menteri adalah pelayan rakyat.
Apalagi, ia mengingatkan bahwa salah satu amanah dari Presiden Joko Widodo kepadanya adalah agar dapat membangun komunikasi dua arah dengan nelayan dan pelaku usaha.
"Sehingga tidak ada lagi istilah seolah-olah negara tidak hadir," katanya.
Tugas kedua yang diamanahkan oleh Kepala Negara, ujar dia, adalah agar dapat membangun sentra perikanan budi daya untuk menambah devisa dan lapangan kerja.
Sebelumnya pengamat perikanan Abdul Halim menyatakan bahwa Edhy Prabowo merupakan sosok yang dinilai akan cepat beradaptasi dalam menggantikan peran Susi Pudjiastuti sebagai Menteri Kelautan dan Perikanan dalam Kabinet Indonesia Maju periode 2019-2024.
"Dengan pengalaman yang dimiliki Pak Edhy sebagai Ketua Komisi IV DPR RI periode 2014-2019 yang salah satunya membidangi urusan kelautan dan perikanan, beliau diharapkan tidak memerlukan waktu lama untuk beradaptasi dan berkoordinasi dengan internal kementeriannya (KKP)," kata Abdul Halim kepada Antara di Jakarta, Rabu.
Abdul Halim yang juga menjabat sebagai Direktur Eksekutif Pusat Kajian Maritim untuk Kemanusiaan itu menyatakan bahwa Edhy Prabowo dalam peran barunya harus fokus dalam sejumlah hal, antara lain memulihkan kepercayaan mesin birokrasi di internal KKP.
Hal tersebut, lanjut Abdul Halim, merupakan hal yang penting agar KKP dapat bekerja sebagai sistem yang solid dan terkoordinasi dengan baik guna menyelesaikan amanah UUD 1945 dan regulasi turunannya.
Selain itu, ujar dia, Edhy Prabowo juga harus dapat memperkuat capaian Menteri Susi dalam konteks menghadirkan tata kelola kelautan dan perikanan yang berkelanjutan serta bertanggung jawab baik dari hulu hingga ke hilir dari sektor kelautan dan perikanan serta kemaritiman nasional.

KKP Minister Edhy Prabowo is Ready to Accompany 24-hour Complaints
06 Nov 2019, 06:33 by Antara, Kodrat Setiawan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Minister of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries, Edhy Prabowo, said that his party is ready for 24 hours to accommodate various complaints and hopes that various parties will not hesitate to visit the KKP if there are problems that need to be helped. "We are ready 24 hours to hear complaints," Minister Edhy said in Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
He said he used to listen to various inputs throughout the day when he was a member of the DPR. The Minister of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries also stated that various parties need not tremble in coming to the ministry because the minister is a public servant.
Moreover, he reminded that one of the mandates from President Joko Widodo was for him to be able to establish two-way communication with fishermen and businesses.
"So there is no longer a term as if the state is not present," he said.
The second task entrusted by the Head of State, he said, was to be able to build a cultivation fisheries center to increase foreign exchange and employment.
Earlier fisheries observer Abdul Halim stated that Edhy Prabowo was a figure who was judged to be quick to adapt in replacing Susi Pudjiastuti's role as Minister of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries in the Advanced Indonesian Cabinet for the 2019-2024 period.
"With the experience of Mr. Edhy as Chairman of Commission IV of the Republic of Indonesia DPR 2014-2019 period, one of which is in charge of maritime affairs and fisheries, he is expected to not need a long time to adapt and coordinate with his internal ministry (KKP)," Abdul Halim told Antara in Jakarta, Wednesday.
Abdul Halim, who also serves as Executive Director of the Maritime Study Center for Humanity, stated that Edhy Prabowo in his new role had to focus on a number of things, including restoring the trust of the bureaucratic machinery within the CTF internally.
This, continued Abdul Halim, is important so that the CTF can work as a solid and well-coordinated system to complete the mandate of the 1945 Constitution and its derivative regulations.
In addition, he said, Edhy Prabowo must also be able to strengthen the achievements of Minister Susi in the context of presenting sustainable and responsible marine and fisheries management both from upstream to downstream from the marine and fisheries sector and the national maritime sector.
